brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a table of interface type, and the average cost that associated OSPF uses when calculating the cost of a link. The following table has the headers Interface Type and 10 to the power of 8 / bps = Cost.

Interface Type 10 to the power of 8 /bps = Cost
Fast Ethernet and faster10 to the power of 8 /100,000,000 bps = 1
Ethernet10 to the power of 8 /10,000,000 bps = 10
E110 to the power of 8 /2,048,000 bps = 48
T110 to the power of 8 /544,000 bps = 64
128Kbps10 to the power of 8 /128,000 bps = 781
64Kbps10 to the power of 8 /64,000 bps = 1562
56Kbps10 to the power of 8 /56,000 bps = 1785
